name: fileheadergenerator
description: Automatically creates (and maintains) file headers for multiple languages.

fileheadergenerator.username.description: Set your own name to sign the headers generated with this extension.

fileheadergenerator.github.description: Set your own github to sign the headers generated with this extension.

fileheadergenerator.searchLines.description: Number of lines to search for the 'Auto updated?' and 'Last edited:' fields. The larger the number, the more you can write before the fields can appear; however, it also increases search cost for files that are not auto updated.

fileheadergenerator.dateFormat.description: The format of dates written by the FileHeaderGenerator. For an overview of the tokens available, refer to the extension's README.
